entry.title: $2150 // True 1 Bed @ 330 East 91 Street - Laundry, Elevator, King Size Bedroom
entry.content:
Beautiful one bedroom home now listed at 330 East 91st Street! Elevator building with laundry in the basement nestled mid block, just off Second Avenue, on the Upper East Side close to Q 4 5 & 6 trains.

Features include:

- Large living room
- King sized bedroom
- Extra closet space including a walk in
- Custom inlaid hardwood floors
- Recessed lighting throughout
- Renovated full kitchen
- Great views overlooking East 91st Street
- Built in AC
- Updated bathroom with tub
- Live-in Super
- 3 blocks from entrance to new 2nd Ave Subway Q train
- Elevator & laundry in building, 5th floor apartment

This is available for any lease start date you prefer between August 10th and August 24th! The owner may consider September 1st for the perfect applicant.

330 East 91st Street is walking distance from the best of everything UES has to offer! For groceries, Key Food is around the corner. You also pass Fairway and Whole Foods on your way home from the nearby 4 & 5 express trains. Take the elevator to the basement and enjoy self service laundry.

Sorry, no dogs please. Cat ok. The photos in this ad are of the actual unit and were taken recently. Guarantors accepted. This listing is only available courtesy of Preston NY, a broker fee applies. Viewings and open houses are by appointment only.

Please contact Alex with any questions or to set up your showing.

617-823-3924
acollicott@prestonny.com

OPEN HOUSE
Tuesday August 7th
Please RSVP for details

entry.title: $2300 // Beautiful one bedroom located on PRIME Upper East Side
entry.content:
NO FEE Beautiful one bedroom located on PRIME Upper East Side, steps away from Q train as well as 4, 5 and 6 train at 86th St station and Central Park. Surrounded by great restaurants, bars, supermarkets and more!
Great and Spacious living room with exposed brick, hardwood floor and huge windows.
Roomy bedroom with great closet inside.
The bathroom contains marbled tiles and a tub with a glass door.
Kitchen features dishwasher, neat white appliances, and LOTS of cabinets storage!
Both the living room and bedroom have hardwood floor and high ceilings.

entry.title: $2500 // Unique 1bed/1bath apartment for rent
entry.content: This 550 square foot apartment home has 1 bedrooms and 1.0 bathrooms. It is located at 354 E 91st St New York, New York. Which features laundry in unit, recently renovated, this apartment offers a unique floor plan with generously proportioned room and beautiful high-grade 5-inch wide plank white oak hardwood floors throughout. The kitchen has been updated with wooden cabinetry and provides ample storage, including a large pantry.
